column1: 8The maxim ‘ut res magis valeat quampereat’ is an important principle of interpretation of statutes which literally
means: “It may rather become operative than null.” The effect of this maxim is that an enacting provision or a
statute has to be so construed to make it effective and operative.https://blog.ipleaders.in/ut-res-magis-valeat-
